projects.title: Alyani's-Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- My Portfolio Web-App made in **React**
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - **Dark Mode Support**
 - Here you can see about me :- 	Like About me,My resume,My projects,My skills,My Education and So on.

projects.title: Multi-Crypto-Details
projects.bodyText:
- **100+** Crypto coins are listed here.
 - some other functions are available like different **coins prices listed** .
- Particular coins in-depth details are available like the progress of coins shown in **chart form** and some days wise data is listed using 
- Third-party Api's **Coingecko.com**.

projects.title: RealTime-Quiz-React-WebApp
projects.bodyText:
- In this web app, some functions are available like **category-wise quizzes**, and difficulty-wise quizzes Like : **Easy/Med/Hard**
- total **10 MCQs** are given particular categories. in this MCQs come from **OpenDB Api's**.
- Online Quiz Website Available on **Netlify**.

projects.title: Beast-Gym
projects.bodyText:
- **A BEAST GYM** website is advertising of a Beast Gym.
- It is an **responsive website**
- **Its Features Like** : User can Login/Register, Gym Features, Expert Trainers, Pricing, Opening-Closing Hours and so on.

projects.title: Spend-Tracker(Team Project)
projects.bodyText:
- A Spend-Tracker Web-App made in React-Native.
- It provides us funtionality to track our daily expences.
- It has Login/Register for user.
- You can not down your day to day trasactions date-wise
- We are still working on it for some better features Like : Monthly Charts, Wallet like paytm,Improving Ui etc...
